text:
There's no point having the analytics
if you can't effect change.
Relative Insight takes unstructured data

and turns it into actionable
insights for key decision makers

In the world of quant,
it's all about the ‘what’.

What we're able to do is
take them into the ‘why’.
We're an AI text analytics platform.
Traditionally we've sold dashboards

to uncover fascinating language
differences in customer experience data.

But we wanted to shorten the time
between the data going into our platform

and the insights and
the action in the business.

That work involves a great
deal of experimentation,

working with new technology,
trying new models.

The AWS Activate
program with credits

enabled us to do that in
a cost effective and scalable way.
Having had access to Amazon Bedrock

we turned a prototype into
a product inside eight weeks.

Accelerator AI is our new
gen AI report writing tool.

It takes the metrics that we produce,
combines it with the raw text data,

and automatically produces
a narrative report.
So fan experience is really important.

Most pro sports teams will do
a survey at the end of every game.

That data is fed into
Relative Insight

so that we can understand
why the fan experience score

is going up, going down
or staying the same.
So for example, let's say

there's more discussion around
the PA system being too loud.

We can understand which
section of the stadium

has got a problem
with the PA system.

We will know where
they sat in the stadium,

whether they're a casual visitor
or a season ticket holder.

We'll know their
age range and so on.

So by doing a comparison between
these different metadata points,

we can reveal what's important
to these different groups.

AWS has really helped us
with our go-to-market.

It's exposed us to a bigger
breadth of buyers

and it's given us a much
stronger strategic outlook

on the benefits we can
bring to enterprises.

We were able to get on
the marketplace within weeks.

This means we can fire up an instance
very quickly for a large customer.

What's next for Relative Insight
is a real focus

on eliminating all friction
between the amazing insights

we can generate and
action in businesses.

Technology at the moment is
moving at a breathtaking pace.

What we've been able to do with large
language models and our platform

to bring our offering
together is quite powerful,

and I think that's just
going to accelerate.

Taking our customers
from data to knowledge.
